import React, {Component} from 'react' import './index' export default class Filmdetails extends Component { render(){ const backdropUrl = `filmsImg${this.props.film.backdrop_path}` const posterUrl = `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w780/${this.props.film.poster_path}` let details = this.props.film.id?

subscriptions No film selected

:

{this.props.film.tagline}

{this.props.film.overview}

return (

DETAILS

{details}
) } }
